mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, COUNT(*) as likes FROM likes WHERE created_at >= #{startDate} AND created_at <= #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE DATE(created_at) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.like_count as commentCount FROM articles a WHERE a.status = '1' ORDER BY a.like_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
